solution_line_template: If Tom could triple his reading speed, he could read {initial_pages_per_hour} * {speed_increase_factor} = <<{initial_pages_per_hour}*{speed_increase_factor}={new_pages_per_hour}>>{new_pages_per_hour} pages of a book in one hour.
Therefore, during two hours he could read {new_pages_per_hour} * {reading_time_hours} = <<{new_pages_per_hour}*{reading_time_hours}={total_pages_read}>>{total_pages_read} pages.
